info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:21PM EDT until July 07 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OTSEGO...NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE AND SOUTHEASTERN CHENANGO COUNTIES... At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bainbridge, or 13 miles north of Deposit, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Walton, Bainbridge, Masonville, Unadilla, Otego, Afton, Franklin, Sidney Center and East Sidney. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
